Yoko.is
About Archive

Hay! My name is Yoko.

I live in Brooklyn and work at Etsy as a product designer. I co-host a podcast called So Where Are You From?. When I’m not doing either of those things, I’m probably dancing, exploring, or internetting. I like pandas.

I’m trying to wean myself off social media and instead send out updates on my life via email. If you’re interested, you can sign up here. In the meantime, I still post on Instagram.

Yoko Sakao Ohama is pretty easy to find on the internet.
She created this website using Jekyll and runs it on Github Pages.
